import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Accept Invitation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/content/{contentType}/invitations/accept"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Accept an invitation from a user to access or edit a content object.

You can find more information about invitations and content [here](../../docs/guides/content/invitations).

### Locale

A locale can be specified for this request. 
The given object will be returned in the specified `locale`.

If no locale is specified, the applications default locale will be used.
You can learn more about configuring the default locale [here](../../docs/guides/configuration).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"contentType","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"locale","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"token":{"type":"string"}},"required":["token"],"title":"AcceptInvitationToContentRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The content object the user was invited to. The response depends on the content object. For [articles](../../docs/guides/content/articles) it will return [`FullArticleResponse`](../../docs/api/schemas/fullarticleresponse)and for [file metadata](../../docs/guides/file-storage/metadata) it will return [`FileMetadataResponse`](../../docs/api/schemas/filemetadataresponse).","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"title":"ContentResponseObject"}}}},"401":{"description":"Invitation `token` is invalid or expired.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"404":{"description":"No content object with `key` or no user with `userId` contained in invitation found","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
